definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
reunion after an absence is sweeter than being newlyweds (idiom)/absence makes the heart grow fonder
variant of 新婚燕爾|新婚燕尔[xin1 hun1 yan4 er3]

sentences.english: Garden Cottages are a favorite of brides for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 花園的別墅是他們的新婚之夜新娘最喜愛的一種。

sentences.english: Where first our marriage-vows were given.
sentences.chinese: 在那兒我們說過新婚的誓言。

sentences.english: Orson: Yes, but actors want opening night to be perfect. That's why they rehearse.
sentences.chinese: 我們都希望我們的新婚之夜是完美的。

sentences.english: "Newly married but soon, the husband made a sorry cuckoldry matter.
sentences.chinese: 可是新婚不久，丈夫就作出了對不起妻子的事。

sentences.english: Family Quarrel The young newly- weds quarreled.
sentences.chinese: 家庭的爭吵一對年輕的新婚夫婦吵架了。

sentences.english: The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.chinese: 新婚套間已準備好以接待度蜜月的人。

sentences.english: Many travel companies offer trips for the wedding couple to faraway places.
sentences.chinese: 許多旅行公司爲新婚夫婦提供遠程旅行路線。

sentences.english: Song Errui of wife of Yao far newly-married is Jin Rui in former days lover.
sentences.chinese: 姚遠新婚妻子宋而瑞是金銳的昔日戀人。

sentences.english: Record the newly-weds honeymoon trip tips and the equipment information.
sentences.chinese: 記錄新婚夫婦蜜月旅程的攻略和裝備信息。

sentences.english: The newly weds will honeymoon in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 那對新婚夫妻將到日本去度蜜月。

sentences.english: That would pave the way for newlywed Odom to start in his place.
sentences.chinese: 那就爲新婚燕爾的奧多姆頂替他首發鋪平了道路。

sentences.english: When I first got married, I wanted to show my love to my new wife.
sentences.chinese: 新婚不久，我想對嬌妻表達自己的愛意。

sentences.english: The newly married couple moved into their new home.
sentences.chinese: 這對新婚夫婦遷入新居。

sentences.english: Sarah: I haven't even been on a date.
sentences.chinese: 新婚姻法全文沒有和快女楊洋不雅照約會過。

sentences.english: These are the new homes for young marrieds.
sentences.chinese: 這些是新婚夫婦們的新房。

sentences.english: How do the newly-married couple hit it off?
sentences.chinese: 這對新婚夫婦相處得怎樣？

definition: bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
